short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take a picture and record videos from webcam and save them to Google Drive and PC. Share them with your friends such as Instagram.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Drive Webcam allows you to take a picture and record videos from your webcam and save them to your Google Drive and PC.
Take pictures, videos directly from your Google Drive, and you can share them with your friends such as Instagram.

This app is a webcam recording tool that can capture image, video from webcams plugged in your computer and save JPG, video file to your Google Drive directly.
Save Webcam to image, Save Webcam to video file.
